mapper.insert: insert into IM_MODEL_FILTER_COLUMN (PK_ID, MODEL_ID, SEQ, NAME, DESCRIBE, TYPE, LENGTH, IS_NEED, DEFAULT_VAL, OPERATOR, LABEL) values (#{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seq,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{length,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isNeed,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{defaultVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update IM_MODEL_FILTER_COLUMN set MODEL_ID = #{modelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEQ = #{seq,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIBE = #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LENGTH = #{length,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_NEED = #{isNeed,jdbcType=CHAR}, DEFAULT_VAL = #{defaultVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATOR = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LABEL = #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select PK_ID, MODEL_ID, SEQ, NAME, DESCRIBE, TYPE, LENGTH, IS_NEED, DEFAULT_VAL, OPERATOR, LABEL from IM_MODEL_FILTER_COLUMN where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select PK_ID, MODEL_ID, SEQ, NAME, DESCRIBE, TYPE, LENGTH, IS_NEED, DEFAULT_VAL, OPERATOR, LABEL from IM_MODEL_FILTER_COLUMN
select PK_ID, MODEL_ID, SEQ, NAME, DESCRIBE, TYPE, LENGTH, IS_NEED, DEFAULT_VAL, OPERATOR, LABEL from IM_MODEL_FILTER_COLUMN where MODEL_ID = #{mid} ORDER BY SEQ asc
